name: All-Electric Vehicle (EV) Rebate MCE
description: The MCEv Program offers a $3,500 rebate for the purchase or lease of a new EV for income-qualifying customers. To be eligible for the rebate, an applicant must live in MCEâ€™s service area, be a MCE customer, and meet at least one of the qualifying income requirements. For more information, including how to apply, see the MCE MCEv Rebates website.
